title: The Great Houdini
creator_credit: American Broadcasting Company and Melville Shavelson
brief_description: A biographical dramatisation created from fact and fiction about one of America’s most fascinating performers and escape artists, Harry Houdini. “The Great Houdini” is a revealing film that provides an insight into his background, his family, his wife (played by Sally Struthers), and his rise to international fame. The memory of Harry Houdini still lives on today. Stars Paul Michael Glasser as Houdini, Ruth Gordon, Vivian Vance, Adrienne Barbeau, Bill Bixby, Peter Cushing, Nina Foch, Wilfred Hyde-White and Maureen O’Sullivan.
